metadata.title: CVE-2019-15678 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inrfbServerCutText handler, which can potentially result code execution..This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
